ISSUE.TITLE: TypeError: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'contains')
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Please confirm the following - [X] I agree to follow this project's [code of conduct](https://docs.ansible.com/ansible/latest/community/code_of_conduct.html). - [X] I have checked the [current issues](https://github.com/ansible/awx/issues) for duplicates. - [X] I understand that AWX is open source software provided for free and that I might not receive a timely response. ### Summary Trying to visit instance details the error is being displayed in prod version: ``` Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'contains') at HTMLDocument.e (AddDropDownButton.js:15:58) ``` Dev server: ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12464858/150571248-8bf73191-e9c2-4688-9090-4196c9180160.png) ### AWX version devel ### Installation method docker on linux ### Modifications no ### Ansible version _No response_ ### Operating system _No response_ ### Web browser Chrome ### Steps to reproduce 1. Navigate to instance list 2. Click on a instance from the list ### Expected results The error to not be thrown ### Actual results Page crashing on dev server and printing the error on the console for prod versions ### Additional information Tests trying to visit instance details are failing due to https://docs.cypress.io/api/events/catalog-of-events#App-Events

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #11517 from AlexSCorey/11236-ExpandCollapseAll Adds expand collapse all functionality on job output page.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix typerror cannot read property of null ``` > x = null null > x?.contains undefined > x.contains Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read property 'contains' of null ``` See: https://github.com/ansible/awx/issues/11582\

Fix typerror cannot read property of null ``` > x = null null > x?.contains undefined > x.contains Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read property 'contains' of null ``` See: https://github.com/ansible/awx/issues/11582
